ygData.subject: Re: hey everyone i'm joe i never play everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: I would suggest holding off on phantasy star online. Once you start playing Everquest you may not want to play anything else, or do anything else for that
ygData.messageBody:
I would suggest holding off on phantasy star online. Once you start
playing Everquest you may not want to play anything else, or do
anything else for that matter.


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Jon" <jon559@s...> wrote:
> A good place to start is to check out the Everquest Online
Adventures website here.
http://everquestonlineadventures.station.sony.com/
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: joe
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Sunday, March 30, 2003 6:50 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] hey everyone i'm joe i never play everquest
>
>
> hey everyone i'm joe. i never play any of the everquest games for
pc.
> i hope to buy everquest online for playstation2. maybe if i save
up a
> enough money or get it for my birthday how much does the internet
> cost online.i wonder if anyone can tell me info on the game. and
> stuff i hope to get it and also phantasy star online episode 1&2.
for
> gamecube. well i gtg talk to you later.
> -joe
